content: BattleQuest Patch 1.2: rebalanced wizard spells, knight HP buff, new rogue stealth ability. Bug fixes.

content: SkyRacer Update 2.1: improved flight physics, added planes, leaderboard reset. Tweaked matchmaking.

content: CyberStrike v3.0: clan war system overhaul, new hacking mini-game, major bug fixes, new skins.

content: CityCraft v2.2: terrain generation improvements, add ‘Creative Pack’ mod hooks, performance optimizations.

content: Tactical Legends 1.1: hero balancing, 2v2 queue fixes, expansions teased for next season.
